one_phrase_summary.description: A one-sentence summary of the HTML element.

summary.description: A brief description of the element's purpose and use.

categories.description: Suggested categories for the element as if it were part of a blog.

functionality.description: An array describing the potential functionalities and use cases of the element.

media_files_description.description: A description of what the images or videos associated with the element might contain, individually. Can be null if not applicable.

key_words.description: A list of keywords or phrases relevant to the element, focusing on what users might search for.

relevant_fields.description: Relevant fields or attributes for the element based on its type.

form_fields.description: Attributes for form fields (e.g., type, name, placeholder, required).

curiosities.description: Any remarkable aspects that make this section unique and important. Can be null if not applicable.

accessibility.description: Accessibility features or considerations for this section. Can be null if not applicable.
